NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 CASSAVA: I am still consumed by my disappointment, Daz. Will we ever find this elusive Eye of the Universe? 2 1 DAZ: Perhaps a change of task will help, my love. I have heard of stowaways who have grown too accustomed to the Sanctuary who have eluded our friends' attempts to release them. 3 2 CASSAVA: I would love to assist. But before that, would you kindly voyage to the Deep Storm Station, my love? I.. I wish for your company. 4 3 DAZ: Of course, love. I shall voyage to the Deep Storm Station to be by your side. 5 3 DAZ: But my love, we must look sunward: though we have encountered a disappointing setback, I have faith our clan will find another way to reach our goals. 6 5 DAZ: Poke, Pye and Clary are already exploring the visiting comet at this very moment! Perhaps we may find an answer to 7 6 CASSAVA: Daz? Did something interrupt your thought? 8 7 CASSAVA: Daz? What's wrong? Daz? Workshop Locked R3 1 Workshop Locked EX2 1,6 DSS CONV1 1,6
